name: Sneaky scout challenge
description:
The Windows version have better color. If you want a better visual experience, don't play the web version but download the .zip instead.

Sneaky Scout Challenge is a mix between a stealth game and a card game.  You play as a scout weasel and your goal is to reach the cookies. But be careful and don't get seen, as the instructors don't want you to have them all.

Game created from scratch in 48h by :

Tristan "MaximusGDN" Glandut  -  Programmer / Level Designer
Tom "Ardos" Parseihian--Hoppenot  -  Programmer / Level Designer
Marius "Seryalh" Edouard  -  Sound & Music Artist
Camille "Colla" Ollagnon  -  Game Artist
William "Wilren" Wojda  -  Game Artist
